FuncDef: The display ifit policy acl applied-record command displays the ACL delivery status of the IFIT policy. The display ifit policy acl applied-record command displays the ACL delivery status of the IFIT policy. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display ifit policy { all | name <policy-name> } aclapplied-recordslot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a traffic policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display ifit policy name huawei acl applied-record slot 1
<HUAWEI> display ifit policy all acl applied-record slot 1
